content: the baby dino egg socks are knit cuff-down with a classic gusseted heel a stranded colorwork pattern around the ankle adds dimension and a funky design written with beginner sock knitters in mind this pattern include instructions for 4 adult sizes with video resources for the knitting techniques used images show the socks knit in size 1 on us women s size 7ish feet with maps yarn luxe sock in baby dino egg as the main color and maps yarn heidi sock in coco s blue as the contrast color
